contextual_notes: The user seems to have limited experience with technology, as indicated by the need to learn basic video call setup.

general_insights: Providing clear, step-by-step guidance is crucial when assisting users with limited technical expertise.

Adapting communication style to match the user's level of expertise can enhance the overall experience.
